alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft; Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 2:19AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: Due to westerly gap flow winds, portions of the I-25 corridor, as well as the Arkansas River Valley and La Veta Pass, are still experiencing higher wind gusts of up to 60 mph. This will continue until around 4 AM, and then winds will begin to weaken. Be especially careful if traveling in high profile vehicles on north to south oriented roads and the I-25 corridor, due to crosswinds. Some blowing dust is also possible, which may temporarily reduce visibilities.
